amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike the telework provisions in the underlying bill and apply the SHOW UP Act telework restrictions to the FAA.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the telework provisions in the underlying bill and apply the SHOW UP Act telework restrictions to the Federal Aviation Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 363).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
